dt: {bc}an object (such as a dish, doorknob, or article of clothing) that may be contaminated with infectious agents (such as bacteria or viruses) and serve in their transmission

et: back-formation from {it}fomites{/it}, from New Latin, plural of {it}fomit-, fomes{/it}, from Latin, kindling wood; akin to Latin {it}fovēre{/it} to heat {ma}{mat|foment|}{/ma}
shortdef: an object (such as a dish, doorknob, or article of clothing) that may be contaminated with infectious agents (such as bacteria or viruses) and serve in their transmission
